name: Berry Bomb
description: Berry Bomb is a hybrid cross between Blueberry and Bomb #1 that shows off its indica-leaning genetics through powerful sedation. A sweet blueberry and earthy pine flavor launches you into Berry Bomb’s potent full-body effects, which can easily help you transition into a restful night or an afternoon nap. According to its breeders at Bomb Seeds, Berry Bomb sometimes expresses itself in cool hues of blue in lower temperatures. Its flowers explode into growth early on, stretching especially tall in outdoor gardens. Berry Bomb thrives in screen of green (SCROG) setups, and indoor plants finish their flowering in a short 6 to 8 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Berry Bomb is a hybrid cross between Blueberry and Bomb #1 that shows off its indica-leaning genetics through powerful sedation. A sweet blueberry and earthy pine flavor launches you into Berry Bomb’s potent full-body effects, which can easily help you transition into a restful night or an afternoon nap. According to its breeders at Bomb Seeds, Berry Bomb sometimes expresses itself in cool hues of blue in lower temperatures. Its flowers explode into growth early on, stretching especially tall in outdoor gardens. Berry Bomb thrives in screen of green (SCROG) setups, and indoor plants finish their flowering in a short 6 to 8 weeks.

highlightedReviews.text: Cross of a hand selected Blueberry mother with the all powerful Bomb #1 father.  Buds are super frosty with a sweet berry perfume and taste. The plant yields as high as 20% THC content and is an indica dominant hybrid. This strain gives a clear head high along with a slight relaxed feeling. Giving off a strong pungent smell but has a sweet blueberry flavor that you would expect from a blueberry strain.

This strain is the perfect strain to smoke when you want all the benefits of being high (relaxed mood, muscle relaxation, clear mind, euphoria) without ganja goggle vision. Didn’t put me to sleep like most indicas, just relaxed me and made it easier to fall asleep.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Berry Bomb, Cream Caramel, Outlaw, Blackberry Rhino, and Phantom Cookies
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
We've added some lovely new indicas, sativas, and hybrids to the Leafly Explorer this week! Already had a chance to try these new varieties? Their strain pages are looking pretty bare and could use your reviews (nudge, nudge)…
Looking for a strain that will really blow you out of the water this weekend? Remember to also check out the High Times Cannabis Cup winning strains from the recent San Francisco competition! 
   1. Berry Bomb
Characteristics of Berry Bomb:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blueberry and Bomb #1
Breeder: Bomb Seeds
Sweet blueberry and earthy pine aroma
Delivers sedating, full-body effects
Indoor flowering time of 6 to 8 weeks

   2. Cream Caramel
Characteristics of Cream Caramel:

90% indica strain
Cross between BlueBlack, Maple Leaf Indica, and White Rhino
Breeder: Sweet Seeds
Sweet caramel candy aroma
Brings heavy, relaxing effects that soothe the mind and body
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   3. Outlaw
Characteristics of Outlaw:

80% sativa strain
Cross between Super Haze and Amnesia
Sweet, earthy, and lemon aroma
Presents an uplifting, clear-headed buzz
May help with glaucoma, inflammation, depression, migraines, and ADD/ADHD
Indoor flowering time of 12 weeks

   4. Blackberry Rhino
Characteristics of Blackberry Rhino:

Mostly indica strain
Cross between Blackberry and White Rhino
Sweet, berry aroma
Has relaxing, happy effects
May help with pain, insomnia, appetite loss, and nausea

   5. Phantom Cookies
Characteristics of Phantom Cookies:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cherry Pie and Granddaddy Purple
Earthy, nutty, grape, and berry aroma
Brings euphoric, creative, and happy effects
May help with nausea, stress, pain, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks indoors
